title: PBE page gone missing?
body: Did anyone else find that the PBE register page had gone missing? everytime i click "I want to help!" it always goes to the page of "was Ziggs here? something blew up on this page . please try again later" and everytime i refresh or restart or anything, it just returns me to that page. what happened to the PBE page Riot?

replies.body: I was able to access the [Sign Up ](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup)page without any issues on my side.  You may have old files or an extension that is causing the error, and DTN's suggestion to[ clearing your cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) could help.  I also suggest trying Incognito Mode as an additional workaround.  I hope that helps!

It's currently working for me. I don't know if it's something with your account or browser, but when you have issues with the site that others don't seem to have I suggest clearing your browser cache.
